<a id="PanelContainer"></a>

# PanelContainer

**Inherits:** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [OpenXRBindingModifierEditor](OpenXRBindingModifierEditor.md), [ScriptEditor](ScriptEditor.md)

A container that keeps its child controls within the area of a [StyleBox](StyleBox.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A container that keeps its child controls within the area of a [StyleBox](StyleBox.md). Useful for giving controls an outline.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

- [Using Containers](../tutorials/ui/gui_containers.md)
